title: Lexi's Litter of Three
description: Hunter, Ava, and Maxwell grow taller and I grow wiser in this second book of the Lexi's Triplets Series. The kids learn to walk and talk, while I learn important life lessons from my canine friendsâ€”and even Granny. Read about the mayhem we run into during my quest to become the best furry parent I can be to my litter of three.
author: Jean  Lee
